message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking for a lower price. I would like to propose $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $105.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your effort in meeting my needs. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to the sweet spot, Bob! I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm now offering the product to you for $102.50.
